#Load Data

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(anytime)

airbnb <- read_csv("data/Airbnb.csv")

```
## Exploratory Data Analysis

``` {r}

today <- as.Date("2021-02-01")
host_days <- time_length(today-airbnb$host_since,"years")

ggplot(airbnb,aes(x=host_since,y=airbnb$review_scores_rating))+
  geom_point()

?as.Date

```
